subject: Running setUp once for all test (version 3.7)
msgSnippet: Can somebody help explain to me how to run setup only once for all my tests using version 3.7 of junit. It doesn t appear as though the old approach documented
messageBody:
Can somebody help explain to me how to run setup only once for all my
tests using version 3.7 of junit. It doesn't appear as though the old
approach documented in the FAQ is supported in the latest release.

Grant
